definition: the posterior part of the body of a vertebrate especially when elongated and extending beyond the trunk or main part of the body, remove the stalk of fruits or berries
details:
noun
- the posterior part of the body of a vertebrate especially when elongated and extending beyond the trunk or main part of the body
- the rear part of a ship
= synonyms: stern, quarter, after part, poop
- the rear part of an aircraft
= synonyms: tail assembly, empennage
- (usually plural) the reverse side of a coin that does not bear the representation of a person's head
- the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
= synonyms: behind, posterior, bottom, stern, bum, hindquarters, rump, can, butt, fundament, rear, seat, fanny, buttocks, nates, backside, buns, hind end, keister, prat, rear end, tail end, tooshie, tush, derriere
- a spy employed to follow someone and report their movements
= synonyms: shadow, shadower
- any projection that resembles the tail of an animal
= synonyms: tail end
- the time of the last part of something
= synonyms: fag end, tail end
verb
- remove the stalk of fruits or berries
- remove or shorten the tail of an animal
= synonyms: bob
- go after with the intent to catch
= synonyms: tag
